channel.title: Facebook on Ramos on Software
channel.description: Recent content in Facebook on Ramos on Software

item.title: Read Last Week - Everybody loves Facebook !
item.description: The register Facebook’s inflection point: Now everyone knows this greedy mass surveillance operation for what it is Slashdot This past week, a New Zealand man was looking through the data Facebook had collected from him in an archive he had pulled down from the social networking site. While scanning the information Facebook had stored about his contacts, Dylan McKay discovered something distressing: Facebook also had about two years worth of phone call metadata from his Android phone
